GoalDesc: Build resilient infrastructure, promote inclusive and sustainable industrialization and foster innovation
TargetDesc: Facilitate sustainable and resilient infrastructure development in developing countries through enhanced financial, technological and technical support to African countries, least developed countries, landlocked developing countries and small island developing States
IndicatorDesc: Total official international support (official development assistance plus other official flows) to infrastructure
SeriesDesc: Total official flows for infrastructure, by recipient countries (millions of constant 2016 United States dollars)
Source: Creditor Reporting System (CRS) database, 2018, The Organisation for Economic Co-operation and Development (OECD)
